error.credentials_incomplete: Credentials incomplete, please fill in username, password and country
error.login_error: Could not login, check the credentials.
error.no_devices: No supported devices found in this account on selected country.

user.description: Map feature requires cloud connection and provides automatic configuration. If you don't want to use the map feature, you can select manual configuration.

local.description: You will need the 32 character API Token, see https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/xiaomi_miio#retrieving-the-access-token for instructions.

mi.description: Log in to the Xiaomi Miio cloud, see https://www.openhab.org/addons/bindings/miio/#country-servers for the cloud server to use.

dreame.description: Log in to the Dreamehome cloud.

devices.description: Please select the Dreame Vacuum device you want to setup.

reauth_confirm.description: Dreame Vacuum integration needs to re-authenticate your account in order to update the tokens or add missing cloud credentials.
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration

error.cloud_credentials_incomplete: Cloud credentials incomplete, please fill in username, password and country

state.box_full: The filter not dry or blocked
state.fan: The filter not dry or blocked
state.left_wheel_motor: The robot is stuck, or its left wheel may be blocked by foreign objects
state.right_wheel_motor: The robot is stuck, or its right wheel may be blocked by foreign objects
state.turn_suffocate: The robot is stuck, or cannot turn
state.forward_suffocate: The robot is stuck, or cannot go forward
state.charge_no_electric: The charging dock is not powered on
state.left_wheell_speed: Left wheel may be blocked by foreign objects
state.right_wheell_speed: Right wheel may be blocked by foreign objects
state.blocked: Cleanup route is blocked, returning to the dock.
state.filter_blocked: The filter not dry or blocked
state.carpet: Please start the robot in non-carpet area.
state.laser: The 3D obstacle avoidance sensor is malfunctioning.
state.no_go_zone: No-Go zone or virtual wall detected.
state.restricted: Detected that the vacuum-mop is in a restricted area.
state.remove_mop: Mopping completed. Please remove and clean the mop in time.
state.mop_removed: The mop pad comes off during the cleaning task.
state.mop_pad_stop_rotate: The mop pad has stopped rotating.
state.bin_full: The dust collection bag is full, or the air duct is blocked.
state.bin_open: The upper cover of auto-empty base is not closed, or the dust collection bag is not installed.
state.water_tank: The clean water tank is not installed.
state.dirty_water_tank: The dirty water tank is full or not installed.
state.water_tank_dry: Low water level in the clean water tank, please fill with water timely.
state.mop_pad: The washboard is not installed properly.
state.wet_mop_pad: The water level of the washboard is abnormal, please clean the washboard timely.
state.clean_mop_pad: The cleaning task is complete, please clean the mop pad washboard.
state.clean_tank_level: Check and fill the clean water tank.
state.dirty_tank_level: The water level in the used water tank is too high.
state.washboard_level: Water level in the washboard is too high.
state.no_mop_in_station: Mop pad is not in the station.
state.dust_bag_full: Dust bag is full or vents are blocked.

state.no_water_left_dismiss: Please check the clean water tank.
state.no_water_left: The water in the clean water tank is about to be used up. Check and fill the clean water tank promptly.
state.no_water_left_after_clean: Mop pad has been cleaned. Detected that the water in the clean water tank is insufficient, please fill the clean water tank and empty the used water tank.
state.no_water_for_clean: Low water level in the clean water tank. Robot has switched to Vacuuming Mode.
state.low_water: About to run out of water. Please fill the clean water tank.
state.tank_not_installed: The clean water tank is not installed.

vacuum_clean_segment.name: Clean Segment
vacuum_clean_segment.description: Start the cleaning operation in the selected rooms.

segments.name: Segments
segments.description: List of rooms to be cleaned. Only room's Character or an array of room's character, cleaning times, fan speed and mop mode to override the default values per room.

repeats.name: Repeats
repeats.description: Number of cleaning passes for every selected room (unless it is overridden by customized cleaning parameter).

suction_level.name: Suction Level
suction_level.description: Fan speed for every selected room (unless it is overridden by customized cleaning parameter).

water_volume.name: Water Volume
water_volume.description: Water level for every selected room (unless it is overridden by customized cleaning parameter).

vacuum_clean_zone.name: Clean Zone
vacuum_clean_zone.description: Start the cleaning operation in the selected area.

repeats.name: Repeats
repeats.description: Number of cleaning passes for every selected zone.

suction_level.name: Suction Level
suction_level.description: Fan speed for every selected zone.

water_volume.name: Water Volume
water_volume.description: Water level for every selected zone.

vacuum_clean_spot.name: Clean Spot
vacuum_clean_spot.description: Start the cleaning operation in the selected points on the map.

points.name: Points
points.description: List of coordinates to be cleaned.

repeats.name: Repeats
repeats.description: Number of cleaning passes for every selected zone.

suction_level.name: Suction Level
suction_level.description: Fan speed for every selected zone.

water_volume.name: Water Volume
water_volume.description: Water level for every selected zone.

vacuum_goto.name: Go To
vacuum_goto.description: Go to the coordinate of the map and stop.

vacuum_follow_path.name: Follow Path
vacuum_follow_path.description: Follow list of coordinates on the map and return to base. (Only supported on vacuums with camera)

points.name: Points
points.description: List of coordinates of the path.

vacuum_remote_control_move_step.name: Remote Control Move Step
vacuum_remote_control_move_step.description: Remotely control move the bot one step.

rotation.name: Rotation
rotation.description: Turn in binary degrees between -128 and 128.

vacuum_install_voice_pack.name: Install Voice Pack
vacuum_install_voice_pack.description: Install official or custom voice pack.

url.name: URL
url.description: Url of this pack it should be reachable by the vacuum bot.

md5.name: MD5
md5.description: MD5 checksum of the language pack.

size.name: Size
size.description: Size of the language pack in bytes.

vacuum_select_map.name: Select Map
vacuum_select_map.description: Select current map. Used when having multiple maps/floors.

map_id.name: Map ID
map_id.description: ID of the map to be selected.

map_id.name: Map ID
map_id.description: ID of the map to be deleted.

vacuum_replace_temporary_map.name: Replace Temporary Map
vacuum_replace_temporary_map.description: Replace the temporary map with another saved map.

map_id.name: Map ID
map_id.description: ID of the map to be replaced with.

map_id.name: Map ID
map_id.description: ID of the map to be restored.

vacuum_set_cleaning_sequence.name: Set Cleaning Sequence
vacuum_set_cleaning_sequence.description: Set room cleaning sequence. (Only on supported devices)

cleaning_sequence.name: Cleanin sequence
cleaning_sequence.description: Segment ID list of cleaning sequence.

vacuum_set_custom_cleaning.name: Set Custom Cleaning
vacuum_set_custom_cleaning.description: Set custom cleaning parameters. (Only on supported devices)

cleaning_mode.name: Cleaning Mode
cleaning_mode.description: Cleaning for each room (only supported on vacuums with mop pad lifting feature).

vacuum_set_restricted_zone.name: Set Restriced Zone
vacuum_set_restricted_zone.description: Define virtual walls, restricted zones, and/or no mop zones.

vacuum_rename_shortcut.name: Rename Shortcut
vacuum_rename_shortcut.description: Rename a shortcut. (Only on supported devices)

vacuum_set_carpet_area.name: Set Carpet Area
vacuum_set_carpet_area.description: Define carpets and ignored carpets. (Only on supported devices)

ignored_carpets.name: Ignored Carpets
ignored_carpets.description: Ignored carpet areas for deleting the automatically detected carpets.

vacuum_set_predefined_points.name: Set Predefined Points
vacuum_set_predefined_points.description: Define predefined coordinates on current map. (Only supported on vacuums with camera)

points.name: Points
points.description: List of coordinates to be saved.

vacuum_set_obstacle_ignore.name: Set Obstacle Ignore
vacuum_set_obstacle_ignore.description: Set ignore status of an obstacle. (Only supported on vacuums with AI Obstacle detection feature)

obstacle_type.name: Obstacle Type
obstacle_type.description: Type of the obstacle that will be ignored.

vacuum_set_router_position.name: Set router position
vacuum_set_router_position.description: Set router position on current map. (Only supported on vacuums with WiFi map feature)

select_select_previous.name: Select Previous
select_select_previous.description: Select the previous options of an select entity.

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the first to the last.

select_select_first.name: Select First
select_select_first.description: Select the first option of an select entity.

select_select_last.name: Select Last
select_select_last.description: Select the last option of an select entity.

select_select_next.name: Select Next
select_select_next.description: Select the next options of an select entity.

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the first to the last.
